name: DEWALT DPG660 Yellow with Black Earcups Dielectric Expandable NRR 25 Cap Mount Earmuff
short_description: DIELECTRIC DESIGN FOR ELECTRICAL SAFETY: The DPG660-D is a passive earmuff constructed with dielectric materials, ensuring metal-free reliability in environments with electrical hazards.

CUSTOMIZABLE FIT: Experience comfort with this easy cap-mount design, extendable and foldable arms, and 4-point suspension system, allowing for a personalized fit and even pressure distribution for extended wear.
NOISE REDUCTION RATING: Providing a Noise Reduction Rating (NRR) of 25dB, means you will get exceptional protection in moderate to high noise environments, ensuring your safety and well-being.

ALL-DAY COMFORT: Designed for extended wear, this cap mount earmuff for helmets/hard hats features padded ear cups that enhance comfort, making it the perfect choice for all-day use, whether on the job site or in industrial settings.
CERTIFIED PEACE OF MIND: Meet CSA Z94.2 Class A Standards with the DPG660-D, offering peace of mind and assurance in any work setting, ensuring compliance with safety regulations and standards.
product_description: The DPG660-D passive earmuff, designed for comfort and safety in diverse environments. Crafted with dielectric construction, this earmuff is perfect for use around electrical hazards, ensuring metal-free reliability. Its easy cap-mount design, along with extendable and foldable arms featuring a 4-point suspension system, allows for a customized and adjustable fit, ensuring even pressure distribution for extended wear. The padded ear cups enhance comfort, making it ideal for all-day use. With a low-profile and lightweight design, this earmuff delivers a Noise Reduction Rating (NRR) of 25dB, providing excellent protection in moderate to high noise environments. Meeting CSA Z94.2 Class A Standards, the DPG660-D offers peace of mind in any work setting.

name: Walker's Unisex Adult's Lightweight Foldable Hearing Protection 22 dB Noise Reduction Pro Low-Profile Earmuffs
product_description: The Walkers Pro Low Profile Folding Passive Earmuffs features a low profile contoured cup that lets them fit closer to your head - ideal for hunting and other active shooting activities where the last thing you need to worry about is snagging your hearing protection on a branch. The Walkers Low Profile Folding Earmuff are passive hearing protection muffs that give you up to 22 NRR of noise reduction. These hearing protectors have a padded headband for comfortable fit, combined with soft PVC ear pads that will let you wear them all day. Walker's Passive Folding Muff: FEATURES AND BENEFITS: - Low profile contoured cup; - Padded headband for comfortable fit; - Noise reduction rating, NRR 22 dB; - Soft PVC ear pads; - Compact folding design; - Ultra-light weight; - Compact folding design; ABOUT WALKERS HEAR LIKE YOU'VE NEVER HEARD BEFORE For over 25 years Walker's has developed innovative solutions to provide ear protection for shooting, hunting, and commercial applications. Walker's line of products is widely considered the industry standard for shooting ear protection and safety. With the introduction of advanced digital circuitry & nano tech water repellence, Walker's continues to raise the bar and provide the best shooting hearing protection.

name: 6 Pack Noise Reduction Ear Protection, Hearing Protection Ear muffs SNR 34dB Noise Cancelling Headphones for Adults Kids Autism, Sound Proof Earmuffs for Mowing/Construction/Work
short_description: PU
Made in the USA or Imported

Efficient Hearing Protection: These noise canceling headphones feature a double-layer sound-dampening foam and a composite housing that effectively reduces noise levels, certified at SNR 34dB (ANSI S3.19, US). They excel at suppressing harmful noises, making them ideal for use in high-noise environments by lowering sound to a safe and comfortable level. Generous space inside the ear cups ensures breathability, while the soft imitation leather creates a tight sound-proof seal.

Universal Fit: These noise-canceling headphones feature retractable steel wires that allow for easy adjustment to fit almost any head size. Simply slide the earmuffs along the headband to find the perfect fit. The safety earmuffs come with 360° rotatable pins, ensuring a customized fit that conforms to your unique head shape and size. With spacious ear cups, they comfortably accommodate all types of ears, providing ample ventilation and ensuring maximum comfort.

Robust Construction for Enhanced Comfort: These noise-canceling ear muffs are designed with durability and ergonomic comfort in mind. The high-density sponge padding and skin-friendly imitation leather create a snug acoustic seal, ensuring a comfortable fit throughout the day. The addition of a specially designed hole at the bottom allows the soft sponge to provide a slow rebound, resulting in a customized and perfect fit.

Convenient Combination: These ear protection earmuffs feature a compact folding design, allowing for easy storage and convenient portability. They fit seamlessly into a range bag or backpack, making them a practical choice for on-the-go use. To ensure their longevity, the earmuffs come with a carrying bag that protects them from dust and other elements.

Expert-Level Hearing Protection: These hearing protection ear muffs have been approved by ANSI S3.19 and CE EN 352-1, ensuring that you receive ear protection supported by scientific standards. With this certification, you can trust that these earmuffs are designed to provide optimal hearing protection in various environments, such as construction sites, woodworking areas, welding stations, lawn mowing, airplane travel, factories, and while operating heavy machinery.

name: WALKER'S Single Mic Compact Folding Sound-Enhancing Hunting Gun Range Shooting Hearing Protection Electronic Muff with Comfort Headband, 2 AAA Batteries Included
product_description: WALKER'S SINGLE MIC HEARING PROTECTION ELECTRONIC MUFF Your hearing is invaluable, and with Walker's Electronic Muffs, it's impeccably safeguarded. Crafted for hunters, range shooters, and outdoor enthusiasts, these hearing protection earmuffs redefine comfort and offer exceptional sound suppression for an optimized shooting experience. With a compact and portable design, these electronic earmuffs are incredibly easy to fold up and store away in any range bag or backpack, allowing you to carry them with you wherever your adventures take you. Whether you're hitting the shooting range or heading out for a day in the wilderness, these earmuffs are your trusted companion for superior comfort and protection. PROTECT IT OR LOSE IT - Comfort headband helps keep you comfortable all day; - Hi-Gain omnidirectional microphone for hearing enhancement; - When something crashes, explodes, runs, crumples, twists, or goes boom these muffs instantly suppress the noises to keep your hearing safe. SPECS: - Full dynamic range HD speakers; - Sound-activated compression (SAC) for hearing protection; - Digital volume control – silent soft touch buttons; - Comfort headband / folding design; - Operates on 2 AAA batteries - included.

name: 3M WorkTunes Connect Wireless Hearing Protector with Bluetooth Technology, Bluetooth Hearing Protection with a 26 dB Noise Reduction Rating
short_description: HELPS PROTECT YOUR HEARING: Helps provide hearing protection with a 26 dB Noise Reduction Rating (NRR)
BLUETOOTH TECHNOLOGY: Stay entertained on the job with Bluetooth wireless technology
PREMIUM SOUND QUALITY: High-fidelity speakers provide premium sound quality
SAFE VOLUME CONTROL/LIMITER: Self-adjusts to help you ensure you’re listening at a safe volume throughout the day
WATER RESISITANT: Water and sweat resistant for durability
40+ HOURS OF BATTERY LIFE: Built-in rechargeable battery offers 40+ hours of battery life and features a USB-C cord and port
AUDIO-ASSIST TECHNOLOGY: Features Audio Assistance Technology for operational set-up and guidance
INTEGRATED MICROPHONE: An integrated microphone allows you to take calls without removing the headset
VOLUME CONTROL ON HEADSET: Ergonomically designed volume controls for easy use, even with gloves
EXTEND THE LIFE OF EARMUFFS: Replace worn or damaged cushions with the 3M Gel Hearing Protector Replacement Hygiene Kit to maintain acceptable noise reduction, hygiene, and comfort.
product_description: The audio entertainment you want. The comfort and hearing protection you need. The new and improved 3M WorkTunes Connect Hearing Protector is built with Bluetooth wireless technology, a 26 dB Noise Reduction Rating and upgraded sound quality to help you make your work more enjoyable than ever. Unlike standard headphones, this hearing protection is designed to help keep hazardous noises at bay while you stream music, podcasts, and audiobooks from your smartphone or other mobile devices. Make or take phone calls without removing your headset or reaching for your phone. Water and sweat resistant, these hearing protection headphones are designed for durability and extended wear. Whether you're sawing or mowing, plowing or drilling, the soft, conformable earcups, vented headband and lightweight, low-profile design help you stay comfortable on the job.
